Monday 19 May

beyond tellerrand // web 2014

@btconf
beyond tellerrand // web 2014 @btconf
05/19/2014 at 9:00 AM in a month 05/21/2014 at 10:00 PM



The affordable event for a friendly and inspiring community again covers fantastic talks about design, technology and inspiration in a signle track plus chats and and networking with old and new friends on day one and two plus. Day three features full-day workshops which will be announced soon. All workshops are limited to a low number of people to keep it an intensive experience for everybody.



http://2014.beyondtellerrand.com/
